THREAT: *POSS LT TURB OVER 24N170E ASSOC WITH COLD FRONT *FRCST MOD TURB FROM FERRAR TO RJTT FL390 AND BELOW ASSOC WITH MULTI JTST OVER JAPAN FL400, FL320 *FRCST SEV TURB SIGMET OVER RJTT FL200-270, NO OBS SEV TURB CURR.
